description: This file contains CSS styling for a Tic Tac Toe web application's frontend, including theme management with CSS variables for light and dark themes, specific styles for application elements, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including layout, background color, and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including dimensions and animation settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section styling, aligned to center with specific size and transition effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, styled with positioning, colors, and transitions.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframes for animating the application logo to spin continuously.
